word_group.brief_definition: 作妥协；做出妥协；作出妥协
可接受的妥协方式（方案）
合理的妥协；合理的折衷
协商妥协；谈判妥协；谈判协商
体面的妥协；保全面子的妥协；爱面子的妥协

bilingual.target: 她在威压下不得不妥协。

bilingual.source: He is unwilling to compromise on principles.
bilingual.target: 他不愿意在原则上妥协。

bilingual.source: She thinks that compromise is a sign of weakness.
bilingual.target: 她认为妥协是一种弱点。

bilingual.source: They had to compromise to reach an agreement.
bilingual.target: 他们不得不妥协以达成协议。

bilingual.source: In negotiations, we must learn to compromise.
bilingual.target: 在谈判中，我们必须学会妥协。

bilingual.source: The upshot of their discussion was a compromise.
bilingual.target: 他们讨论的结果是达成了妥协。

bilingual.source: She refused to compromise her principles for money.
bilingual.target: 她拒绝为金钱妥协她的原则。

bilingual.source: It's important to compromise in a relationship.
bilingual.target: 在一段关系中，妥协是很重要的。

bilingual.source: The new policy obliterated any hope of a compromise.
bilingual.target: 新政策消灭了任何妥协的希望。

bilingual.source: The zealots refused to compromise on their demands.
bilingual.target: 狂热者拒绝在他们的要求上妥协。

yingyinNormal.en: We are willing to continue discussions on a potential compromise.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们愿意继续谈判基于一个有可能性的妥协的基础上

yingyinNormal.en: And because I don't have children, and he does. They know I won't compromise. No president would.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还有因为我没有孩子，而康威有，他们知道我不会妥协，没有总统会妥协。

yingyinNormal.en: You have no idea what it takes to make a marriage work. All right, it's about compromise.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们根本不知道如何维持婚姻，婚姻就是互相妥协。

yingyinNormal.en: Sure, we'll disagree on some things. We'll have to compromise on others.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当然，我们在一些事情上不会有完全相同的观点，我们要和其他人去妥协。

yingyinNormal.en: I do not understand why any form of compromise is beyond him. You wanted a strong editor.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不明白他怎么就不能接受任何妥协。是你想要个强势的编辑。

yingyinNormal.en: Compromise. Reassurance. That's how the world works. Believe me, this is the middle ground.
yingyinNormal.zh: 妥协，保证，世界就是这样运转的。相信我，这就是中间立场。

yingyinNormal.en: So, you know, isn't there maybe some way you and Sheldon could compromise on this whole presentation thing?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你跟谢尔顿在演讲这件事情上就没有互相妥协的余地吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Raymond told me this was your idea, to pursue this compromise. I suggested it as an option.
yingyinNormal.zh: Raymond告诉我这是你的点子？做出妥协？我只是提出建议。

yingyinNormal.en: I would say anyone is wrong to try to compromise somebody's conviction. I don't care it's the army or what it is.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我认为任何人都是错的若要去妥协他人的信念。我不在乎是军队或者是什么。

yingyinNormal.en: And five months later, Democrats, Republicans, and Independents in the Senate came together to pass a commonsense compromise bill.
yingyinNormal.zh: 五个月后，参议院的民主党人，共和党人以及独立党派人士一起通过了常识性的妥协性法案。

yingyinNormal.en: No. Scientists do not compromise. Our minds are trained to synthesize facts and come to inarguable conclusions. Not to mention, Sheldon is bat-crap crazy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，科学家从不妥协。我们的大脑被锻炼成就是把事实结合起来然后得出无可辩驳的结论。更不用说，谢尔顿还是个怪胎。

yingyinNormal.en: You're saying that I have to emotionally compromise you guys?
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以你是我要在情感上说服你们？

yingyinNormal.en: We're prepared to compromise on the divorce settlement. We're not.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们准备就离婚协议进行和解。我们不想。

yingyinNormal.en: Compromise. Watch Babylon 5. In what sense is that a compromise?
yingyinNormal.zh: 折衷一下吧，看《巴比伦5号》。你凭什么认为这是折衷的办法？

yingyinNormal.en: Well, there we go. Compromise. That wasn't so hard, was it?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那就去吧，折中的办法，应该不会太困难吧？

yingyinNormal.en: They've already put up the show. They'll be panicked and want to compromise.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们已经开始展览了，一定会方寸大乱并要求和解。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, how about a compromise then, okay? What if it's like you know, Chanoey?
yingyinNormal.zh: 加起来除以二如何？例如…钱道伊？

yingyinNormal.en: We do have a table. No, thank you. No, we're not gonna compromise our principles just for…
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们有一张空桌子。不，谢谢，不行，我们不能仅仅为了食物放弃信念……

yingyinNormal.en: How about white-water rafting? How about we compromise and go on the Small world ride at Disneyland?
yingyinNormal.zh: 一起去漂流怎么样？不如我们折中一下，去迪士尼玩小小世界之旅？

yingyinNormal.en: And now look, the trumpet player. He's got his own idea. It's conflict and it's compromise, and it's just…
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在你看，那个小号手。他有自己的思路。这是冲突与融合的过程。这就是…

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: settle a dispute by mutual concession

examination_example.sentence: We neither understand nor respect each other, and we have no basis for <highlight>compromise</highlight> or cooperation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们既不了解对方，也不尊重对方，也没有妥协与合作的基础。
毫不妥协地判麦克唐奈有罪。

examination_example.sentence: The astronomy community is making <highlight>compromises</highlight> to change its use of Mauna Kea.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 天文学界正在做出妥协，改变对莫纳克亚山的使用。

sense_info_list.en: cause to become vulnerable or function less effectively
an agreement or a settlement of a dispute that is reached by each side making concessions

word_usage.usage:
compromise与动词reach、make等搭配，表示“妥协; 和解”时，为可数名词。例：
Eventually they reached a compromise.
他们最终达成了和解。
但当compromise自身作“达成妥协或和解”解时，为不可数名词。例：
Compromise is an inevitable part of life. 
妥协是生活不可避免的一部份。
compromise作不及物动词时，意思是“折中解决”，常与介词with搭配，表示“向某人妥协”。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: I thought that teaching looked like a pretty good <highlight>compromise</highlight> (妥协 )，especially because of the long holidays.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我认为教学看起来是一个很好的折中行业，尤其是因为假期很长。
